00034 #define Pr(x) std::cerr << #x << " = " << x << std::endl
00035 // TCLAP include
00036 #include <tclap/CmdLine.h>
00037 
00038 // STL includes
00039 #include "string"
00040 #include "cstdlib"
00041 #include "fstream"
00042 
00043 // ITK includes
00044 #include "itkImage.h"
00045 #include "itkVectorImage.h"
00046 #include "itkImageFileReader.h"
00047 #include "itkImageFileWriter.h"
00048 #include "itkImageRegionIteratorWithIndex.h"
00049 #include "itkImageRegionIterator.h"
00050 #include "itkMatrix.h"

00053 // BTK includes
00054 #include "btkNrrdField.h"
00055 #include "btkNiftiFilenameRadix.h"

00057 
00058 typedef short PixelType;
00059 const unsigned int InDimension  = 3;
00060 const unsigned int OutDimension = 4;
00061 
00062 typedef itk::VectorImage<PixelType,InDimension> InSequence;
00063 typedef itk::ImageFileReader<InSequence> InSequenceFileReader;
00064 typedef itk::ImageFileWriter<InSequence> InSequenceFileWriter;
00065 typedef itk::ImageRegionIteratorWithIndex<InSequence> InSequenceIterator;
00066 
00067 typedef itk::Image<PixelType,OutDimension> OutSequence;
00068 typedef itk::ImageFileReader<OutSequence> OutSequenceFileReader;
00069 typedef itk::ImageFileWriter<OutSequence> OutSequenceFileWriter;
00070 
00071 const unsigned int Dimension = 3;
00072 typedef itk::Image<PixelType,Dimension> Image;
00073 typedef itk::ImageFileReader<Image> ImageFileReader;
00074 typedef itk::ImageFileWriter<Image> ImageFileWriter;
00075 typedef itk::ImageRegionIterator<Image> ImageIterator;
00076 
00077 
00078 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00079 {
00080     //
00081     // Parse program's arguments
00082     //
00083 
00084     // Define command line variables
00085     std::string inFileName;
00086     std::string outFileName;
00087     std::string vecFileName;
00088     std::string bvalFileName;
00089     bool dwi;
00090 
00091     std::string outRadix;
00092 
00093     // Define command line parser
00094     TCLAP::CmdLine cmd("Nrrd to Nifti Converter", ' ', "0.1");
00095 
00096     // Define command line arguments
00097     TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> inArg("i", "input", "Input image", true, "", "string", cmd);
00098     TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> outArg("o", "output", "Output image (default \"data.nii.gz\")", false, "data.nii.gz", "string", cmd);
00099 
00100     TCLAP::SwitchArg dwiArg("", "dwi", "DWI image conversion", cmd, false);
00101 
00102     // Parse arguments
00103     cmd.parse(argc, argv);
00104 
00105     // Get back arguments' values
00106     inFileName   = inArg.getValue();
00107     outFileName  = outArg.getValue();
00108     dwi          = dwiArg.getValue();
00109 
00110     outRadix     = btk::GetRadixOf(outFileName);
00111     vecFileName  = outRadix + ".bvec";
00112     bvalFileName = outRadix + ".bval";
00113 
00114 
00115     if(dwi)
00116     {
00117         //
00118         // Read input image (Nrrd file format)
00119         //
00120 
00121         std::cout << "Reading file..." << std::flush;
00122 
00123         InSequenceFileReader::Pointer reader = InSequenceFileReader::New();
00124         reader->SetFileName(inFileName.c_str());
00125         reader->Update();
00126 
00127 
00128         std::fstream headFile(inFileName.c_str(), std::fstream::in);
00129 
00130         std::string s;
00131         std::string key;
00132         std::string value;
00133         unsigned int bvalue = 0;
00134         bool stop = false;
00135 
00136         char buf[256];
00137         headFile.getline(buf, 256);
00138         s = buf;
00139 
00140         while(!stop && !headFile.eof() && !headFile.fail() && !headFile.bad())
00141         {
00142             btk::btkNrrdField field(s);
00143             key   = field.GetKey();
00144             value = field.GetValue();
00145 
00146             if(key == "DWMRI_b-value")
00147             {
00148                 std::stringstream st;
00149                 st << value;
00150                 st >> bvalue;
00151             }
00152             else if(key == "DWMRI_gradient_0000")
00153             {
00154                 stop = true;
00155             }
00156 
00157             headFile.getline(buf,256);
00158             s = buf;
00159         }
00160 
00161         std::vector<double> vx;
00162         std::vector<double> vy;
00163         std::vector<double> vz;
00164         std::vector<unsigned int> bvals;
00165 
00166         if(stop == true)
00167         {
00168             double x,y,z;
00169 
00170             std::stringstream st;
00171             st << value;
00172             st >> x; vx.push_back(x);
00173             st >> y; vy.push_back(y);
00174             st >> z; vz.push_back(z);
00175 
00176                 if(x == 0 && y == 0 && z == 0)
00177                     bvals.push_back(0);
00178                 else
00179                     bvals.push_back(bvalue);
00180 
00181             while(!headFile.eof() && !headFile.fail() && !headFile.bad())
00182             {
00183                 btk::btkNrrdField field(s);
00184                 key   = field.GetKey();
00185                 value = field.GetValue();
00186 
00187                 st.clear();
00188                 st << value;
00189                 st >> x; vx.push_back(x);
00190                 st >> y; vy.push_back(y);
00191                 st >> z; vz.push_back(z);
00192 
00193                 if(x == 0 && y == 0 && z == 0)
00194                     bvals.push_back(0);
00195                 else
00196                     bvals.push_back(bvalue);
00197 
00198                 headFile.getline(buf,256);
00199                 s = buf;
00200             }
00201         }
00202 
00203         headFile.close();
00204 
00205         std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00206 
00207 
00208         //
00209         // Convert file
00210         //
00211 
00212         std::cout << "Converting file..." << std::endl;
00213 
00214         // Image properties
00215         OutSequence::SizeType size;
00216         size[0] = reader->GetOutput()->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(0);
00217         size[1] = reader->GetOutput()->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(1);
00218         size[2] = reader->GetOutput()->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(2);
00219         size[3] = reader->GetOutput()->GetVectorLength();
00220 
00221         std::cout << "\tsize: " << size[0] << "x" << size[1] << "x" << size[2] << "x" << size[3] << std::endl;
00222 
00223         OutSequence::PointType origin;
00224         origin[0] = reader->GetOutput()->GetOrigin()[0];
00225         origin[1] = reader->GetOutput()->GetOrigin()[1];
00226         origin[2] = reader->GetOutput()->GetOrigin()[2];
00227         origin[3] = 0;
00228 
00229         std::cout << "\torigin = (" << origin[0] << "," << origin[1] << "," << origin[2] << ")" << std::endl;
00230 
00231         OutSequence::SpacingType spacing;
00232         spacing[0] = reader->GetOutput()->GetSpacing()[0];
00233         spacing[1] = reader->GetOutput()->GetSpacing()[1];
00234         spacing[2] = reader->GetOutput()->GetSpacing()[2];
00235         spacing[3] = 1;
00236 
00237         std::cout << "\tspacing: " << spacing[0] << "x" << spacing[1] << "x" << spacing[2] << "x" << spacing[3] << std::endl;
00238 
00239         itk::Matrix<double,4,4> dirMat;
00240         itk::Matrix<double,3,3> iniMat = reader->GetOutput()->GetDirection();
00241 
00242         dirMat(0,0) = iniMat(0,0);
00243         dirMat(0,1) = iniMat(0,1);
00244         dirMat(0,2) = iniMat(0,2);
00245         dirMat(0,3) = 0;
00246 
00247         dirMat(1,0) = iniMat(1,0);
00248         dirMat(1,1) = iniMat(1,1);
00249         dirMat(1,2) = iniMat(1,2);
00250         dirMat(1,3) = 0;
00251 
00252         dirMat(2,0) = iniMat(2,0);
00253         dirMat(2,1) = iniMat(2,1);
00254         dirMat(2,2) = iniMat(2,2);
00255         dirMat(2,3) = 0;
00256 
00257         dirMat(3,0) = 0;
00258         dirMat(3,1) = 0;
00259         dirMat(3,2) = 0;
00260         dirMat(3,3) = 1;
00261 
00262         // FIXME : the image's orientation seems not to be read in nifti files, although it is correct to nrrd header file.
00263         std::cout << "\torientation:" << std::endl;
00264         std::cout << "\t(" << dirMat(0,0) << "," << dirMat(0,1) << "," << dirMat(0,2) << "," << dirMat(0,3) << ")" << std::endl;
00265         std::cout << "\t(" << dirMat(1,0) << "," << dirMat(1,1) << "," << dirMat(1,2) << "," << dirMat(1,3) << ")" << std::endl;
00266         std::cout << "\t(" << dirMat(2,0) << "," << dirMat(2,1) << "," << dirMat(2,2) << "," << dirMat(2,3) << ")" << std::endl;
00267         std::cout << "\t(" << dirMat(3,0) << "," << dirMat(3,1) << "," << dirMat(3,2) << "," << dirMat(3,3) << ")" << std::endl;
00268 
00269         // Temporary image file
00270         OutSequence::Pointer image = OutSequence::New();
00271         image->SetRegions(size);
00272         image->SetOrigin(origin);
00273         image->SetSpacing(spacing);
00274         image->SetDirection(dirMat);
00275         image->Allocate();
00276         image->FillBuffer(0);
00277 
00278         // Iterators
00279         InSequenceIterator in(reader->GetOutput(), reader->GetOutput()->GetLargestPossibleRegion());
00280 
00281         // Conversion loop
00282         for(in.GoToBegin(); !in.IsAtEnd(); ++in)
00283         {
00284             for(unsigned int k=0; k<reader->GetOutput()->GetVectorLength(); k++)
00285             {
00286                 InSequence::IndexType  inIndex = in.GetIndex();
00287 
00288                 OutSequence::IndexType outIndex;
00289                 outIndex[0] = inIndex[0]; outIndex[1] = inIndex[1]; outIndex[2] = inIndex[2]; outIndex[3] = k;
00290 
00291                 image->SetPixel(outIndex, in.Get()[k]);
00292             } // for each scalar
00293         } // for each vector
00294 
00295         // Conversion loop for gradient vectors (world coordinates to image coordinates)
00296         vnl_vector<double> worldCoord(3);
00297         vnl_vector<double> imgCoord(3);
00298         vnl_matrix<double> wcToImg = vnl_inverse(iniMat.GetVnlMatrix());
00299         std::vector<double>::iterator ivx;
00300         std::vector<double>::iterator ivy;
00301         std::vector<double>::iterator ivz;
00302         for(ivx=vx.begin(), ivy=vy.begin(), ivz=vz.begin(); ivx!=vx.end() && ivy!=vy.end() && ivz!=vz.end(); ivx++, ivy++, ivz++)
00303         {
00304             worldCoord(0) = -(*ivx); worldCoord(1) = -(*ivy); worldCoord(2) = *ivz;
00305             imgCoord = wcToImg * worldCoord;
00306             *ivx = imgCoord(0); *ivy = imgCoord(1); *ivz = imgCoord(2);
00307         }
00308 
00309         std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00310 
00311 
00312         //
00313         // Write output image (Nifti file format)
00314         //
00315 
00316         std::cout << "Writing file..." << std::flush;
00317 
00318         OutSequenceFileWriter::Pointer writer = OutSequenceFileWriter::New();
00319         writer->SetFileName(outFileName);
00320         writer->SetInput(image);
00321 
00322         try
00323         {
00324             // image
00325             writer->Update();
00326 
00327             // gradient table
00328             std::fstream bvecFile(vecFileName.c_str(), std::fstream::out);
00329 
00330             for(std::vector<double>::iterator it=vx.begin(); it != vx.end(); it++)
00331                 bvecFile << *it << " ";
00332 
00333             bvecFile << std::endl;
00334 
00335             for(std::vector<double>::iterator it=vy.begin(); it != vy.end(); it++)
00336                 bvecFile << *it << " ";
00337 
00338             bvecFile << std::endl;
00339 
00340             for(std::vector<double>::iterator it=vz.begin(); it != vz.end(); it++)
00341                 bvecFile << *it << " ";
00342 
00343             bvecFile << std::endl;
00344 
00345             bvecFile.close();
00346 
00347             // b-values
00348             std::fstream bvalFile(bvalFileName.c_str(), std::fstream::out);
00349 
00350             for(std::vector<unsigned int>::iterator it=bvals.begin(); it != bvals.end(); it++)
00351                 bvalFile << *it << " ";
00352 
00353             bvalFile.close();
00354 
00355             std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00356         }
00357         catch(itk::ExceptionObject &err)
00358         {
00359             std::cout << "Error: " << err << std::endl;
00360         }
00361     }
00362     else // not dwi image
00363     {
00364         //
00365         // Read input image (Nrrd file format)
00366         //
00367 
00368         std::cout << "Reading file..." << std::flush;
00369 
00370         ImageFileReader::Pointer reader = ImageFileReader::New();
00371         reader->SetFileName(inFileName.c_str());
00372         reader->Update();
00373 
00374         std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00375 
00376 
00377         //
00378         // Convert file
00379         //
00380 
00381         std::cout << "Converting file..." << std::endl;
00382 
00383         // Image properties
00384         Image::SizeType size;
00385         size[0] = reader->GetOutput()->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(0);
00386         size[1] = reader->GetOutput()->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(1);
00387         size[2] = reader->GetOutput()->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize(2);
00388 
00389         std::cout << "\tsize: " << size[0] << "x" << size[1] << "x" << size[2] << std::endl;
00390 
00391         Image::PointType origin;
00392         origin[0] = reader->GetOutput()->GetOrigin()[0];
00393         origin[1] = reader->GetOutput()->GetOrigin()[1];
00394         origin[2] = reader->GetOutput()->GetOrigin()[2];
00395 
00396         std::cout << "\torigin = (" << origin[0] << "," << origin[1] << "," << origin[2] << ")" << std::endl;
00397 
00398         Image::SpacingType spacing;
00399         spacing[0] = reader->GetOutput()->GetSpacing()[0];
00400         spacing[1] = reader->GetOutput()->GetSpacing()[1];
00401         spacing[2] = reader->GetOutput()->GetSpacing()[2];
00402 
00403         std::cout << "\tspacing: " << spacing[0] << "x" << spacing[1] << "x" << spacing[2] << std::endl;
00404 
00405         itk::Matrix<double,4,4> dirMat;
00406         itk::Matrix<double,3,3> iniMat = reader->GetOutput()->GetDirection();
00407 
00408         dirMat(0,0) = iniMat(0,0);
00409         dirMat(0,1) = iniMat(0,1);
00410         dirMat(0,2) = iniMat(0,2);
00411         dirMat(0,3) = 0;
00412 
00413         dirMat(1,0) = iniMat(1,0);
00414         dirMat(1,1) = iniMat(1,1);
00415         dirMat(1,2) = iniMat(1,2);
00416         dirMat(1,3) = 0;
00417 
00418         dirMat(2,0) = iniMat(2,0);
00419         dirMat(2,1) = iniMat(2,1);
00420         dirMat(2,2) = iniMat(2,2);
00421         dirMat(2,3) = 0;
00422 
00423         dirMat(3,0) = 0;
00424         dirMat(3,1) = 0;
00425         dirMat(3,2) = 0;
00426         dirMat(3,3) = 1;
00427 
00428         std::cout << "\torientation:" << std::endl;
00429         std::cout << "\t(" << dirMat(0,0) << "," << dirMat(0,1) << "," << dirMat(0,2) << ")" << std::endl;
00430         std::cout << "\t(" << dirMat(1,0) << "," << dirMat(1,1) << "," << dirMat(1,2) << ")" << std::endl;
00431         std::cout << "\t(" << dirMat(2,0) << "," << dirMat(2,1) << "," << dirMat(2,2) << ")" << std::endl;
00432 
00433         // Temporary image file
00434         Image::Pointer image = Image::New();
00435         image->SetRegions(size);
00436         image->SetOrigin(origin);
00437         image->SetSpacing(spacing);
00438         image->Allocate();
00439         image->FillBuffer(0);
00440 
00441         // Iterators
00442         ImageIterator in(reader->GetOutput(), reader->GetOutput()->GetLargestPossibleRegion());
00443         ImageIterator out(image, image->GetLargestPossibleRegion());
00444 
00445         // Conversion loop
00446         for(in.GoToBegin(), out.GoToBegin(); !in.IsAtEnd() && !out.IsAtEnd(); ++in, ++out)
00447         {
00448             out.Set(in.Get());
00449         } // for each vector
00450 
00451         std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00452 
00453 
00454         //
00455         // Write output image (Nifti file format)
00456         //
00457 
00458         std::cout << "Writing file..." << std::flush;
00459 
00460         ImageFileWriter::Pointer writer = ImageFileWriter::New();
00461         writer->SetFileName(outFileName);
00462         writer->SetInput(reader->GetOutput());
00463 
00464         try
00465         {
00466             writer->Update();
00467 
00468             std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00469         }
00470         catch(itk::ExceptionObject &err)
00471         {
00472             std::cout << "Error: " << err << std::endl;
00473         }
00474     }
00475 
00476 
00477 
00478     return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00479 }
